title: Email
body: I have a new email, and no access to my old one, how can I change it when I cant log into my old email for the code?

replies.body: That's certainly an interesting predicament you've gotten yourself into! No worries though, reach out to our account team in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and, once you verify yourself as the original creator, we should be able to update that email for ya!
